title: Corrections & Amplifications
text:
Walt Disney Co. increased its content spending under former Chief Executive Bob Chapek dramatically, to around $30 billion this fiscal year alone. A Page One article on Tuesday about the company incorrectly said the content spending was for Disney+ alone. The error was repeated in some editions Wednesday in a Business & Finance article about the company.

(See: "Disney Executives Told Board They Lost Faith in Ousted CEO" -- WSJ Nov. 22, 2022)

---

A photo with a Page One article Wednesday about a hearing in the FTX bankruptcycase showed FTX advisersat thebankruptcy court. The photo caption in some editions incorrectly said they were all attorneys for FTX.

---

Readers can alert The Wall Street Journal to any errors in news articles by e-mailing wsjcontact@wsj.com or by calling 888-410-2667.
